mapper.select: SELECT od.order_detail_idx, od.product_idx, p.product_name, od.cart_qty, (p.product_price * od.cart_qty) AS product_price, s.delivery_cost, od.checked_yn, s.store_name FROM product p JOIN orders_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_idx JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.idx JOIN orders o ON o.order_idx = od.order_detail_idx WHERE od.cart_qty > 0 AND o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT od.order_detail_idx, od.product_idx, p.product_name, od.cart_qty, (p.product_price * od.cart_qty) AS product_price, s.delivery_cost, od.checked_yn FROM product p JOIN orders_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_idx JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.idx JOIN orders o ON o.order_idx = od.order_detail_idx WHERE od.cart_qty > 0 AND od.checked_yn = 'Y' AND o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT od.order_detail_idx, o.order_idx, od.product_idx, p.product_name, od.success_qty, p.product_price, s.delivery_cost, od.checked_yn FROM product p JOIN orders_detail od ON p.product_id = od.product_idx JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.idx JOIN orders o ON o.order_idx = od.order_detail_idx WHERE od.success_qty > 0 AND o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT SUM(p.product_price * od.cart_qty) AS bs_cost, MAX(s.delivery_cost) AS ds_cost, (SUM(p.product_price * od.cart_qty) + MAX(s.delivery_cost)) AS final_cost FROM product p JOIN orders_detail od ON p.product_idx = od.product_idx JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.idx JOIN orders o ON o.order_idx = od.order_detail_idx WHERE od.cart_qty > 0 AND o.checked_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE orders_detail SET cart_qty = 0 WHERE product_idx = #{productIdx}
UPDATE orders_detail SET checked_yn = 'Y' WHERE product_idx = #{productIdx}
UPDATE orders_detail SET cart_qty = cart_qty + 1 WHERE product_idx = #{productIdx} AND cart_qty < 999
UPDATE orders_detail SET cart_qty = cart_qty - 1 WHERE product_idx = #{productIdx} AND cart_qty > 1
UPDATE orders_detail SET success_qty = success_qty + cart_qty, cart_qty = 0 WHERE cart_qty > 0 AND checked_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders_detail (product_idx, order_cnt, order_sum, cart_qty) VALUES (#{productIdx}, #{orderCnt}, #{orderCnt}, #{cartQty})
INSERT INTO orders (user_id, order_date) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW())
